name: Liste-de-courses
body:
### Important notice
This Application is in development, you will only find here :
* The application goal.
* Some application source codes.
* Development progress.

For more information, visit my website (French) :
`http://alberto-hugo.com`

### Welcome to My 'Liste De Courses' App
'Liste De Courses' is an Android Application.
With this App, you can add products you want to buy in a list, list you can share with other people if you
are doing shopping with them. Bought products are deleted from your list and automatically deleted as well from lists you share.

### Shops, radius and products
Theses will be added to the main database with a back office Qt application.
With this, users will only have to select a product from a particular radius and just add it to his/her shopping list.

### Authors and Contributors
Alberto hugo (@HugoAlberto), main developer.A special thanks to my teacher G.Thomassin (@gthom).

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with the application goal? Check out the [context](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1kyiJnzjMTj71TWQFZwnwOzTeblIiWIoN85yaGJypEUk/pub) (French) or visit my website at this [adress](http://alberto-hugo.com/listeDeCourses).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
